products.name: Auto Insurance
products.description: Comprehensive insurance coverage for your car, providing peace of mind and financial protection in case of accidents, theft, or damage.

products.name: Health Insurance
products.description: Affordable health coverage that includes doctor visits, prescription medications, and preventive care.

products.name: Home Insurance
products.description: Protection for your home, covering damages from fires, storms, burglaries, and more.

products.name: Travel Insurance
products.description: Travel with confidence knowing you're covered for trip cancellations, lost baggage, and medical emergencies.

products.name: Life Insurance
products.description: Ensure financial security for your loved ones in case of an unfortunate event. Protect their future.

products.name: Pet Insurance
products.description: Comprehensive coverage for your furry friends, covering vet bills and unexpected pet health expenses.

products.name: Renters Insurance
products.description: Protection for your rented home, covering personal belongings, liability, and more.

products.name: Boat Insurance
products.description: Insurance for your boat or watercraft, covering damage, accidents, and liability on the water.

products.name: Travel Cancellation Insurance
products.description: Peace of mind for your trips, providing reimbursement for canceled travel plans and unexpected events.

products.name: Business Insurance
products.description: Protection for your business, covering property, liability, and more for entrepreneurs and enterprises.

products.name: Dental Insurance
products.description: Comprehensive dental coverage, including routine check-ups, cleanings, and major dental procedures.

products.name: Cyber Insurance
products.description: Protection for your business or personal data against cyber threats, including data breaches and hacking.

products.name: Flood Insurance
products.description: Coverage for damage caused by flooding, protecting your property and possessions during floods.

products.name: Earthquake Insurance
products.description: Protection against earthquake damage to your property and belongings, ensuring financial stability.
